[I]Immitate a shrugging gesture with a few tentacles.[/I]
[I]Mache mit ein paar Tentakeln eine achselzuckende Geste.[/I]
[I]Hold out a stone of nearly incomprehensible color.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
[I]Halte einen Stein von fast unverstndlicher Farbe heraus.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](ffnet den Handel)[/COLOR]
[I]There's a moment of silence. Even with the Universal Translator, communicating verbally appears impossible. The creature seems relaxed, tentacles waving at the screen.[/I]

[I]Es gibt einen Moment der Stille. Selbst mit dem Universalbersetzer scheint es unmglich zu sein, sich verbal zu verstndigen. Die Kreatur wirkt entspannt und winkt mit ihren Tentakeln auf dem Bildschirm.[/I]
You are quite possibly the most disturbing thing I have ever seen. I'm sure you get that a lot.
Du bist so ziemlich das Beunruhigendste, was ich je gesehen habe. Ich bin sicher, dass du das oft hrst.
Now, how did you- You're not one of our larvas.
Wie hast du... Du gehrst nicht zu unseren Larven.
Salutations? We hope you are open to friendly diplomatic relations.
Begrungen? Wir hoffen, du bist offen fr freundschaftliche diplomatische Beziehungen.
If you're not edible and don't make good slaves, then you'll be happy to know we'll probably destroy you last.
Wenn du nicht essbar bist und keine guten Sklaven abgibst, wirst du dich freuen, dass wir dich wahrscheinlich als letztes vernichten.
We will try to show you the same respect all life, and we hope you'll prove more sentient than you look.
Wir werden versuchen, dir den gleichen Respekt entgegenzubringen wie allen anderen Lebewesen, und wir hoffen, dass du dich als empfindsamer erweist, als du aussiehst.
As foul and astray as you appear, accept The Way, and we may manage your salvation.
So verdorben und verirrt du auch erscheinen magst, nimm den Weg an, und wir knnen deine Rettung schaffen.
Are you familiar with the laws of economics? If not, we'd happily induct you into the interstellar market.
Bist du mit den Gesetzen der Wirtschaft vertraut? Wenn nicht, wrden wir dich gerne in den interstellaren Markt einfhren.
Are you some form of befouled root system?
Bist du eine Art verschmutztes Wurzelsystem?
Oh! You're, ummm, interesting. I represent the Terran Resistance. Let's find some common ground.
Oh! Du bist, hm, interessant. Ich vertrete den terranischen Widerstand. Lass uns eine gemeinsame Basis finden.
When did your malformed ilk learn to construct and use a communicator? Have you any need of it? Since when did sentient races make deals with oversized diseases?
Wann hat euer deformiertes Geschpf gelernt, einen Kommunikator zu bauen und zu benutzen? Braucht ihr ihn berhaupt? Seit wann machen intelligente Rassen Geschfte mit bergroen Krankheiten?
I have boots more threatening than you. Squirm away on your rotting worlds, and I might delay your extermination.
Ich habe Stiefel, die bedrohlicher sind als du. Wenn du dich auf deinen verrottenden Welten windest, verzgere ich vielleicht deine Ausrottung.
[I]The organism on the screen before you squirms like some deeply discomforting nightmare.[/I]
[I]Der Organismus auf dem Bildschirm vor dir windet sich wie ein zutiefst beunruhigender Albtraum.[/I]
[I]The flailing creature on the screen resembles a larva if you ignore the haphazard growth of appendages and eyes.[/I]
[I]Die zappelnde Kreatur auf dem Bildschirm hnelt einer Larve, wenn du das wahllose Wachstum der Gliedmaen und Augen ignorierst.[/I]
[I]The revolting worm-like creature dares to try and make eye contact.[/I]
[I]Die widerliche wurmartige Kreatur wagt es, Augenkontakt zu suchen.[/I]
[I]The organic life before you does not match any currently understood evolutionary trend. Mute == true.[/I]
[I]Das organische Leben vor dir entspricht keinem derzeit verstandenen evolutionren Trend. Stumm == wahr.[/I]
[I]Even as diverse as the oceans are, nothing quite like the creature undulating on screen has been recorded before.[/I]
[I]So vielfltig die Ozeane auch sind, so wurde doch noch nie etwas hnliches wie die Kreatur, die sich auf dem Bildschirm bewegt, aufgenommen.[/I]
[I]A mass of organic matter shifts about on the screen. It fails to produce sound but makes many nondescript motions with various appendages and eyes.[/I]
[I]Eine Masse aus organischer Materie bewegt sich auf dem Bildschirm. Sie gibt keine Gerusche von sich, macht aber viele unscheinbare Bewegungen mit verschiedenen Gliedmaen und Augen.[/I]
[I]A few sharp movements couple the silence of the indecipherable alien on the screen.[/I]
[I]Ein paar scharfe Bewegungen unterbrechen die Stille des unentzifferbaren Auerirdischen auf dem Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]The flailing lifeform before you looks soft, weak, and (most revoltingly) like it'd taste horrible.[/I]
[I]Die zappelnde Lebensform vor dir sieht weich und schwach aus, und vor allem so, als wrde sie furchtbar schmecken.[/I]
[I]Before you is an Irradiated, a race that makes up the Cosmic Contaminant. Beyond their presence in the galaxy, very little is known beyond they can not verbally communicate.[/I]

[I]Vor dir steht ein Irradiated, eine Rasse, die die Kosmische Verseuchung ausmacht. ber ihre Anwesenheit in der Galaxie ist nur sehr wenig bekannt, abgesehen davon, dass sie nicht verbal kommunizieren knnen.[/I]
Umm, hello? Let's try to get along, I guess.
hm, hallo? Lass uns versuchen, miteinander auszukommen, denke ich.
[I]Wave a few tentacles at the screen.[/I]
[I]Winke mit ein paar Tentakeln auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]Squirm in a way that imitates nodding.[/I]
[I]Zappele so, dass du ein Nicken imitierst.[/I]
[I]Wave a tentacle in dismissal of the brute.[/I]
[I]Winke mit einem Tentakel, um den Rohling abzuweisen.[/I]
[I]Hold up a few shiny objects in affirmation.[/I]
[I]Halte ein paar glnzende Gegenstnde hoch, um sie zu besttigen.[/I]
Well. This meeting has been eventful.
Nun. Dieses Treffen war sehr ereignisreich.
I can't possibly tell if you're groveling or not.
Ich kann unmglich sagen, ob du zu Kreuze kriechst oder nicht.
What extreme circumstances must have produced you.
Welch extreme Umstnde mssen dich hervorgebracht haben.
Come, learn The Way. There is absolution for all.
Komm und lerne den Weg. Es gibt Absolution fr alle.
Per first contact protocol: Greetings, we come in peace.
Laut Erstkontakt-Protokoll: Gre, wir kommen in Frieden.
The nicest thing I can say is you're a waste of my time.
Das Netteste, was ich sagen kann, ist, dass du eine Verschwendung meiner Zeit bist.
We hope that we may understand each other over time.
Wir hoffen, dass wir uns mit der Zeit verstehen werden.
[I]Maintain intense eye contact till surreptitiously closing the Incoming Message.[/I]
[I]Halte intensiven Augenkontakt, bis du die eingehende Nachricht heimlich schliet.[/I]
The less I have to see of you, the better.
Je weniger ich von dir sehen muss, desto besser.
[I]Wave a dismissive tentacle at the screen.[/I]
[I]Winke mit einem abweisenden Tentakel auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]Verschieben und erweitern, um grer zu erscheinen.[/I]
[I]Dreh dich um, um Verpflichtungen zu vermeiden.[/I]
[I]Curl a threatening tentacle at the screen.[/I]
[I]Richte einen bedrohlichen Tentakel auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]Du windest dich unbehaglich und vermeidest Blickkontakt.[/I]
[I]Roll eyes before waving dismissively at the screen.[/I]
[I]Augen rollen, bevor du abweisend auf den Bildschirm winkst.[/I]
[I]Maintain distasteful eye contact till they hang up.[/I]
[I]Stare at the screen to instill discomfort.[/I]
[I]Starre auf den Bildschirm, um Unbehagen zu wecken.[/I]
[I]Angrily throw the closest loose object at the screen.[/I]
[I]Wirf wtend den nchstgelegenen losen Gegenstand auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
Your warm squirming mass is perfect for our eggs.
Deine warme, zappelnde Masse ist perfekt fr unsere Eier.
Utterly foul. Do not try to contact me again.
Vllig unanstndig. Versuche nicht, mich noch einmal zu kontaktieren.
There is something profoundly discomforting about looking at you.
Es hat etwas zutiefst Unangenehmes, dich anzuschauen.
Stay clear of The Way, and we'll extend mercy.
Halte dich vom Weg fern, und wir werden Gnade walten lassen.
Per the possible parasitic lifeform addendum: This is your warning.
Zu den mglichen parasitren Lebensformen: Dies ist deine Warnung.
Riding the universe of your weakness should be easy enough.
Es sollte einfach sein, das Universum deiner Schwche zu reiten.
We have yet to determine whether you are truly dangerous.
Wir mssen noch feststellen, ob du wirklich gefhrlich bist.
[I]The lifeform crushes something small in one of its tentacles. They just conquered one of your worlds.[/I]
[I]Die Lebensform zerquetscht etwas Kleines in einem ihrer Tentakel. Sie haben gerade eine deiner Welten erobert.[/I]
[I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
[I]Das zappelnde Lebewesen wirft etwas auf den Bildschirm und behlt dabei einen intensiven finsteren Blick.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Wir sind im Krieg)[/COLOR]
[I]Throw a pile of sludge at the screen.[/I]
[I]Wirf einen Haufen Schlamm auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]The mass of organic matter on the screen holds out a scrap of something white, seeming to ask for an end to the ongoing conflict.[/I]
[I]Die Masse an organischer Materie auf dem Bildschirm hlt ein Stckchen von etwas Weiem in die Hhe und scheint um ein Ende des Konflikts zu bitten.[/I]
[I]Hold up a tentacle to signal agreement.[/I]
[I]Halte einen Tentakel hoch, um Zustimmung zu signalisieren.[/I]
[I]Squirm to indicate discomfort with the current terms but avoid complete disagreement.[/I]
[I]Zappele, um zu zeigen, dass du mit den aktuellen Bedingungen unzufrieden bist, aber vermeide es, vllig anderer Meinung zu sein.[/I]
[I]Writhe in mock laughter to downright refuse the request.[/I]
[I]Sich vor Lachen krmmen, um die Aufforderung schlichtweg abzulehnen.[/I]
[I]A loose object is tossed to the side before appendages flailed threateningly, the offer refused.[/I]
[I]Ein loser Gegenstand wird zur Seite geworfen, bevor er drohend mit den Gliedmaen fuchtelt und das Angebot ablehnt.[/I]
[I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
[I]Die bestrahlte Lebensform starrt geduldig auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]The entity on screen frantically writhes, glancing about manically. What few appendages it spares wave you away.[/I]
[I]Das Wesen auf dem Bildschirm windet sich hektisch und blickt manisch umher. Die wenigen Anhngsel, die es hat, winken dich weg.[/I]

[I]The entity on screen angrily writhes, frantic in their erratic motions and behavior. They're quite preoccupied with the Everwar. In the short time it's on-screen several indiscernible items are thrown at the screen.[/I]

[I]Das Wesen auf dem Bildschirm windet sich wtend und verzweifelt in seinen unberechenbaren Bewegungen und seinem Verhalten. Sie ist sehr mit dem Everwar beschftigt. In der kurzen Zeit, in der es auf dem Bildschirm zu sehen ist, werden mehrere nicht identifizierbare Gegenstnde auf den Bildschirm geworfen.[/I]
[I]The entity on screen jostles in what could generously be called laughter. It waves a dismissive tentacle, refusing to help now that the galaxy has turned on you.[/I]

[I]Das Wesen auf dem Bildschirm schttelt sich, was man grozgig als Lachen bezeichnen knnte. Es winkt mit einem abweisenden Tentakel und weigert sich, dir zu helfen, da sich die Galaxie gegen dich gewandt hat.[/I]
[I]The entity on-screen looks shocked and confused, at least as close as it can, given its appearance. It gestures widely around. They're just as preoccupied with the apocalypse as anyone.[/I]

[I]Das Wesen auf dem Bildschirm sieht schockiert und verwirrt aus, zumindest so gut, wie es angesichts seines Aussehens sein kann. Es gestikuliert ausgiebig in der Gegend. Sie sind genauso mit der Apokalypse beschftigt wie alle anderen.[/I]
[I]Shakes angrily at the screen, the trade unacceptable.[/I]
[I]Schttelt wtend auf den Bildschirm, der Handel ist inakzeptabel.[/I]
[I]The mute alien waves happily at the screen after accepting the trade offer.[/I]
[I]Der stumme Auerirdische winkt frhlich auf den Bildschirm, nachdem er das Handelsangebot angenommen hat.[/I]
[I]Stares patiently at the screen awaiting your offer.[/I]
[I]Starrt geduldig auf den Bildschirm und wartet auf dein Angebot.[/I]
[I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
[I]Die bestrahlte Lebensform starrt geduldig auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
[I]Die bestrahlte Lebensform starrt geduldig auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
[I]Gestures broadly at some new items added to the trade.[/I]
[I]Gesteht breit ber einige neue Gegenstnde, die dem Handel hinzugefgt wurden.[/I]
[I]Make the most threatening gesture you can think of; surely they'll understand it means war![/I]
[I]Mach die bedrohlichste Geste, die du dir vorstellen kannst; sie werden sicher verstehen, dass das Krieg bedeutet![/I]
[I]Hold up a weapon to indicate your intent to go to war.[/I]
[I]Halte eine Waffe hoch, um deine Absicht zu zeigen, in den Krieg zu ziehen.[/I]
[I]Make several elaborate gestures in an attempt to communicate your desire for peace.[/I] (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)
[I]Mache mehrere komplizierte Gesten, um deinen Wunsch nach Frieden zu vermitteln.[/I] (Du musst den Universalbersetzer erforschen, um Frieden zu verhandeln)
[I]Hold out a white object to indicate your intentions to negotiate for peace.[/I]
[I]Halte einen weien Gegenstand hoch, um zu zeigen, dass du fr den Frieden verhandeln willst.[/I]
[I]The lifeform glowers at the screen, the intense gaze filling with anger.[/I]
[I]Die Lebensform starrt den Bildschirm an, der intensive Blick ist voller Zorn.[/I]
[I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]
[I]Die chaotische, sich windende Nachricht ist nicht zu entziffern und das einzige Gerusch, das von der Kommunikation ausgeht, ist ein leises, blubberndes Hintergrundgerusch.[/I]
[I]The lifeform barely makes eye contact, a dismissive tentacle indicating a lack of interest in communicating.[/I]
[I]Die Lebensform nimmt kaum Augenkontakt auf, ein abweisender Tentakel zeigt, dass sie kein Interesse an einer Kommunikation hat.[/I]
[I]The entity on screen responds with deeply discomforting movements.[/I]
[I]Das Wesen auf dem Bildschirm reagiert mit zutiefst beunruhigenden Bewegungen.[/I]
[I]The entity on screen writhes in anger, tentacles curling in a clear threat.[/I]
[I]Das Wesen auf dem Bildschirm windet sich vor Wut, die Tentakel rollen sich bedrohlich zusammen.[/I]
[I]Perform a typical gesture of aggression that probably doesn't translate.[/I]
[I]Fhre eine typische Geste der Aggression aus, die sich wahrscheinlich nicht bersetzen lsst.[/I]
[I]Stare astutely at the screen to instill a deep discomfort.[/I]
[I]Starre aufmerksam auf den Bildschirm, um ein tiefes Unbehagen zu erzeugen.[/I]
[I]Adjust behavior sharply to seem relaxed, avoiding instigating war at the last moment.[/I]
[I]Passe dein Verhalten so an, dass es entspannt wirkt und vermeide es, im letzten Moment einen Krieg anzuzetteln.[/I]
[I]Wave several dismissive, joking tentacles to avoid instigating a war.[/I]
[I]Winke mit mehreren abweisenden, scherzhaften Tentakeln, um keinen Krieg anzuzetteln.[/I]
[I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
[I]Die bestrahlte Lebensform starrt geduldig auf den Bildschirm.[/I]
Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.
Erzhlt Geschichten von den seltsamen onen, die sie berlebt haben.
Understands the grandeur that reduces life to transient incidents.
Versteht die Erhabenheit, die das Leben auf flchtige Ereignisse reduziert.
Will only discuss thoughts and dreams.
Will nur ber Gedanken und Trume sprechen.
Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.
Er sieht das Universum als einen Comic, in dem das Gefhl der Witz ist.
Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.
Er beneidet diejenigen, deren Verstand die Inhalte des Universums nicht zuordnen kann.
Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.
Versucht, die Wissenschaften in eine einzige Richtung zu lenken.
Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.
Ich war Zeuge, wie dunkle Planeten den Kosmos ohne Ziel durchquert haben.
Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.
Er ist nicht neidisch auf die Unwissenden und ihr ruhiges Leben.
Considers time and space incidental considerations.
Bercksichtigt Zeit und Raum als Nebenschlichkeiten.
Trume im wachen und im schlafenden Zustand.
Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.
Skizziert hufig Runen an versteckten Orten.
Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.
Kmpft damit, zwischen Mglichkeit und Wirklichkeit zu unterscheiden.
Searches the stars for something unknown.
Sucht die Sterne nach etwas Unbekanntem ab.
Witnessed that which should not be.
Zeuge von dem, was nicht sein sollte.

Let's keep this short. I only need to know what your kind looks like to know what to hunt for when we've shattered your worlds and broken your wills.
Let's keep this short. I only need to know what your kind looks like to know what to hunt for when we've shattered your worlds and broken your wills.
The universe belongs to the Korath and the Korath alone. We will wipe out any that dare exist in our presence.
The universe belongs to the Korath and the Korath alone. We will wipe out any that dare exist in our presence.
Run and cry to whatever you think will save you from extinction at the hands of the Korath.
Run and cry to whatever you think will save you from extinction at the hands of the Korath.
I see even the Empire's rejects have managed to survive. I guess we can try to get along if your mood has improved.
I see even the Empire's rejects have managed to survive. I guess we can try to get along if your mood has improved.
Your deal with the ill forces of the galaxy will doom all. If it's of use, we'd beseech you to reconsider your course through history.
Your deal with the ill forces of the galaxy will doom all. If it's of use, we'd beseech you to reconsider your course through history.
Oh, no. I had really hoped the rumors were false.
Oh, no. I had really hoped the rumors were false.
So, the prodigal Clan returns. Have you come to bend knee once more to the Empire? Return as our shock troops, and the universe will know the terror of a united Empire.
So, the prodigal Clan returns. Have you come to bend knee once more to the Empire? Return as our shock troops, and the universe will know the terror of a united Empire.
Are the Drengin bickering between themselves now? Is your desire for conflict really that boundless?
Are the Drengin bickering between themselves now? Is your desire for conflict really that boundless?
No matter what you call yourself, I have no mercy for Drengin.
No matter what you call yourself, I have no mercy for Drengin.
No! This can't be. I thought the Korath Clan was wiped out when the Empire fell.
No! This can't be. I thought the Korath Clan was wiped out when the Empire fell.
Good, the Alliance survives. I'd hate to have never been unable to exact revenge.
Good, the Alliance survives. I'd hate to have never been unable to exact revenge.
Know that the Korath Clan does not honor whatever mercy the Drengin Empire may have extended. No act can save you from extinction.
Know that the Korath Clan does not honor whatever mercy the Drengin Empire may have extended. No act can save you from extinction.
The fact your frail, small kind has been allowed to survive is a testament to how weak the universe allows itself to be. We'll be sure to rectify this.
The fact your frail, small kind has been allowed to survive is a testament to how weak the universe allows itself to be. We'll be sure to rectify this.
The Empire failed! Your chains do nothing but bind you to the weak. The only course forward is annihilation! The Korath Clan will carry on the Drengin legacy. We have no use for your weakness.
The Empire failed! Your chains do nothing but bind you to the weak. The only course forward is annihilation! The Korath Clan will carry on the Drengin legacy. We have no use for your weakness.
Don't think we'll spare you just because you're made of metal. Extinction will come for you all the same, and we'll use your broken bodies to repair our weapons and ships.
Don't think we'll spare you just because you're made of metal. Extinction will come for you all the same, and we'll use your broken bodies to repair our weapons and ships.
You survived. Another failing of the Empire. The Korath Clan won't make the same mistake.
You survived. Another failing of the Empire. The Korath Clan won't make the same mistake.
We've found you. You spent so long cowering in corners of the universe, but we won't lose you this time. The Korath Clan will finally snuff out your group of survivors.
We've found you. You spent so long cowering in corners of the universe, but we won't lose you this time. The Korath Clan will finally snuff out your group of survivors.
This must be a joke. You can't possibly have survived this long.
This must be a joke. You can't possibly have survived this long.
I hope only some of our meetings are this hostile.
I hope only some of our meetings are this hostile.
Watch your tongue, or I'll pull it from your screaming head.
Watch your tongue, or I'll pull it from your screaming head.
You forget the Korath Clan does not extend mercy.
You forget the Korath Clan does not extend mercy.
Hope is a common mistake among the weak.
Hope is a common mistake among the weak.
Ha! Weak Drengin, like those of the Empire, are no Drengin.
Ha! Weak Drengin, like those of the Empire, are no Drengin.
Mind yourself! The Korath Clan needs no reason to annihilate the weak.
Mind yourself! The Korath Clan needs no reason to annihilate the weak.
There is nothing strong enough to wipe out the Korath Clan.
There is nothing strong enough to wipe out the Korath Clan.
We don't need to keep up this hostility.
We don't need to keep up this hostility.
I hope you'll reconsider if given time.
I hope you'll reconsider if given time.
You'll find us more resilient than we look.
You'll find us more resilient than we look.
Mind your tongue! You're nothing but a rebellious legion.
Mind your tongue! You're nothing but a rebellious legion.
Threat registered. We anticipate a change in results.
Threat registered. We anticipate a change in results.
Threaten all you like. I refuse to fear you.
Threaten all you like. I refuse to fear you.
The Resistance is prepared for the worst you can manage.
The Resistance is prepared for the worst you can manage.
I'll wait until you're done with your tantrum.
I'll wait until you're done with your tantrum.
Laugh while you can. The Korath clan will see to your extinction soon enough.
Laugh while you can. The Korath clan will see to your extinction soon enough.
Our course through history will be one of conquest.
Our course through history will be one of conquest.
Surrender and the Korath put you and your fears to rest.
Surrender and the Korath put you and your fears to rest.
You offer chains; we'll offer relief from your humiliation through death.
You offer chains; we'll offer relief from your humiliation through death.
Remember this as the moment you ensured your own extinction.
Remember this as the moment you ensured your own extinction.
No longer bound by the Empire's rules, the Korath can finally wipe you out of existence.
No longer bound by the Empire's rules, the Korath can finally wipe you out of existence.
And I thought your petty Resistance had been stomped out.
And I thought your petty Resistance had been stomped out.
Try, and I'll be happy to remind you what we did to the Empire.
Try, and I'll be happy to remind you what we did to the Empire.
You've been beaten before; you'll be beaten again. I'm not gonna worry.
You've been beaten before; you'll be beaten again. I'm not gonna worry.
There's only one thing to do with a rabid war dog.
There's only one thing to do with a rabid war dog.
You're hardly as threatening as you think. I'm terminating this communication.
You're hardly as threatening as you think. I'm terminating this communication.
The Resistance is familiar with your tactics. You're no threat to us.
The Resistance is familiar with your tactics. You're no threat to us.
Your continued resistance is futile. The Korath will see to your extinction.
Your continued resistance is futile. The Korath will see to your extinction.
We've let you languish long enough. The time has come to rip your civilization apart and rid the galaxy of your ilk![BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
We've let you languish long enough. The time has come to rip your civilization apart and rid the galaxy of your ilk![BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

You've been a thorn in the Drengin's side long enough. It's time to stomp you out. In a decade's time, no one will remember the Terran Alliance.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

You've been a thorn in the Drengin's side long enough. It's time to stomp you out. In a decade's time, no one will remember the Terran Alliance.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
You've avoided your fate long enough. The Korath will stomp out your petty band of outcasts.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
You've avoided your fate long enough. The Korath will stomp out your petty band of outcasts.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
If you're not here to surrender to your extinction by the Korath Clan, what do you want?
If you're not here to surrender to your extinction by the Korath Clan, what do you want?
Rethink that offer before I pull you apart.
Rethink that offer before I pull you apart.
Don't think this trade ensures your safety.
Don't think this trade ensures your safety.
Make this trade worth my time, or I'll forcefully take it.
Make this trade worth my time, or I'll forcefully take it.
You think yourself worthy to speak to the Korath?
You think yourself worthy to speak to the Korath?
It is rare to meet someone that we believe is an equal to us. It is perplexing. Let us haggle.
It is rare to meet someone that we believe is an equal to us. It is perplexing. Let us haggle.
Despite you being some sort of animated meat, we have come to appreciate you if not your kind. Let us begin negotiations.
Despite you being some sort of animated meat, we have come to appreciate you if not your kind. Let us begin negotiations.
You seem more intelligent than most of the entities we have encountered in this area of space. To that end, we propose the a trade.
You seem more intelligent than most of the entities we have encountered in this area of space. To that end, we propose the a trade.
It is good to see you, {LEADERNAME:1}. As your friends we wish to ensure that you are supplied with our latest goods.
It is good to see you, {LEADERNAME:1}. As your friends we wish to ensure that you are supplied with our latest goods.
We have decided not to try to eat you. We have become accustomed to your face.
We have decided not to try to eat you. We have become accustomed to your face.
You may be scum but you are our kind of scum. Let us trade goods and not speak where they came from.
You may be scum but you are our kind of scum. Let us trade goods and not speak where they came from.
We see the wisdom of the Precursors in you. Let us trade.
We see the wisdom of the Precursors in you. Let us trade.
While you are not holy we do see you as a friend. Let us begin trading.
While you are not holy we do see you as a friend. Let us begin trading.
For you, my friend, I have the best prices and best deal in the galaxy.
For you, my friend, I have the best prices and best deal in the galaxy.
In the end we must exterminate all others. But we want you to know that because of our friendship, we will exterminate you last.
In the end we must exterminate all others. But we want you to know that because of our friendship, we will exterminate you last.
You think you've won? We may be losing but we will make slaves of you yet!
You think you've won? We may be losing but we will make slaves of you yet!
God shall make you pay for what you have done. We will yet rise above you.
God shall make you pay for what you have done. We will yet rise above you.
Our civilization has been in much tighter scrapes than this. We will yet find a way to defeat you.
Our civilization has been in much tighter scrapes than this. We will yet find a way to defeat you.
If it is our destiny to be exterminated by you then so be it.

Ihr biologischen Wesen msst noch lernen, dass Maschinen berlegen sind.

Through your creative use of guns, ships and ships with guns, you have put your boot on the galaxy's neck. All of your enemies have been crushed, their planets beaten into submission, and their citizens made to wave your flag. It wasn't pretty, but it never had to be, did it?

Durch Euren kreativen Nutzen von Waffen, Schiffen und Schiffen mit Waffen habt Ihr der Galaxie gezeigt, wo es langgeht. All Eure Feinde wurden zerschmettert, Ihre Planeten in die Unterwerfung getrieben, Ihre Bewohner davon berzeugt, Eure Flagge zu schwenken. Es war nicht elegant, aber das sollte es ja auch nicht sein, oder?

Your culture has spread across the entire galaxy. Aliens everywhere are seeking to emulate the ways of your people, adding or removing limbs as necessary to better fit their vision of the perfect life you lead. Who needs to conquer the bodies when you already own their hearts and minds?

Eure Kultur hat sich in der gesamten Galaxie verbreitet. Allenthalben eifern die Vlker Euch und Eurer Lebensweise nach. Sie fgen Gliedmaen hinzu oder entfernen sie, je nach dem, was besser zu der Vision von einem perfekten Lebensstil passt, den Ihr ihnen vorlebt. Wer muss schon Gefangene nehmen, wenn sie einem freiwillig folgen?

Using your powerful brains, your culture has unlocked the secrets of not only this universe, but the one beyond. Let the simpletons of the galaxy squabble over the dust and fragments of rock they squat upon. For your people, something far greater beckons.

Mithilfe Eurer leistungsstarken Gehirne hat es Eure Kultur geschafft, nicht nur die Geheimnisse des Universums, sondern bis weit darber hinaus zu lften. Sollen sich die Narren der Galaxie ber Staub und Stein streiten, auf dem sie siedeln. Auf Euer Volk wartet wahrlich Groes.

Your study of the ways of the Precursors is complete, and your people will soon be indistinguishable from the Precursors themselves. Having mastered their technology and way of thinking, your people are about to set out on a journey that the lesser minds of this galaxy cannot even begin to comprehend.

Eure Studien ber die Wege der Precursors sind abgeschlossen, und Euer Volk wird schon bald nicht mehr von den Precursors selbst zu unterscheiden sein. Euer Volk hat ihre Technologie und Ihre Denkweise gemeistert und bricht nun zu einer Reise auf, die die weniger leistungsfhigen Kpfe dieser Galaxie nicht ansatzweise begreifen knnen.

Another race has followed the path of the Precursors and ascended. Though our destruction is not immediate, you have led us to become evolutionary obsolete. Our spaceships and lasers have little meaning to a race beyond mortality, to whom time and space are children's toys. To them, we aren't even truly sentient, we are dust blowing around the galaxy, ignored or destroyed as their whims dictate.

Ein anderes Volk ist dem Pfad der Precursor gefolgt und aufgestiegen. Wenngleich unsere Zerstrung nicht umgehend bevorsteht, sind wir dank Euch evolutionr gesprochen obsolet. Unsere Raumschiffe und Laser haben fr ein Volk jenseits der Sterblichkeit, fr das Zeit und Raum Lappalien sind, wenig Bedeutung. Fr so ein Volk sind wir nicht wirklich fhlende Wesen, sondern nur Staub, der durch die Galaxie weht und der je nach Stimmungslage ignoriert oder zerstrt wird.

And with the stroke of a pen, peace was finally at hand. A peace that would last, for it had been laid on a foundation of mutual trust and respect. With their minds and resources no longer wasted on the unending thirst of war, a new golden age of prosperity soon descends upon your people and its allies.

Und mit einem Federstrich war der Frieden endlich nah. Ein Frieden, der anhalten sollte, da er auf gegenseitigem Vertrauen und Respekt beruhte. Nun, da keine Gedanken und Ressourcen mehr fr den unendlichen Kriegsdurst verschwendet werden, legt sich ein neues Goldenes Zeitalter des Wohlstands ber Euer Volk und seine Alliierten.

For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.

Seit Jahren schon kmpft und streitet sich Euer Volk auf der galaktischen Bhne mit seinen ehrgeizigen und hinterhltigen Nachbarn. Und obwohl kein einziges Volk je den entscheidenden Vorteil erlangte, war es Euer Volk, das am Ende die beste Position inne hatte, als der Konflikt zu einem Abnutzungskrieg wurde.

For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.

Seit Jahren schon kmpft und streitet sich Euer Volk auf der galaktischen Bhne mit seinen ehrgeizigen und hinterhltigen Nachbarn. Und obwohl kein einziges Volk je den entscheidenden Vorteil erlangte, war es Euer Volk, das am Ende die beste Position inne hatte, als der Konflikt zu einem Abnutzungskrieg wurde.

And with that, your civilization collapsed. For a time, your people lived on, scattered around the galaxy as refugees and hermits. But your species' power never returned. Will your people be remembered in museums and textbooks, or wiped from the memories of all beings? You'll never know. It's not up to you to say anymore.

Und damit zerbrach Eure Zivilisation. Fr eine gewisse Zeit lebten Eure Leute noch weiter, verteilten sich in der Galaxie als Flchtlinge und Einsiedler. Aber die Macht Eurer Spezies kehrte nie zurck. Wird man sich an Euer Volk erinnern, in Museen oder Schulbchern? Oder werden Sie aus den Gedchtnissen aller Wesen gestrichen? Wir werden es nie erfahren. Es liegt nicht mehr an Euch.

Building a galaxy spanning civilization takes a long time, and not everyone has the patience for it. Will your people understand that you did the best you could, or will they curse you for abandoning them while aliens devour their bones? Don't let it keep you up at night (you should let it keep you up at night).

Eine Zivilisation aufzubauen, die sich ber die ganze Galaxie erstreckt, dauert sehr lang, und nicht jeder hat die Geduld dafr. Wird Euer Volk je verstehen, dass Ihr Euer Bestes gegeben habt? Oder wird es Euch dafr verfluchen, dass Ihr es verlassen habt, als die Feinde an ihren Knochen nagten? Lasst es nicht Euren Schlaf rauben. (Eigentlich sollte es Euch aber doch den Schlaf rauben.)

What foul pollutant of a creature crosses my screen?
Welch stinkende, unreine Kreatur drngt sich in meinen Bildschirm?
It's nice to meet you and your kind, Korath.
Schn, Sie und Ihr Volk kennenzulernen, Korath.
Mind your manners, Korath. You won't intimidate anyone here.

How wretched a life you must live, not being one of us. Soon it will be over, for you and all your kind.
Wie erbrmlich Euer Leben sein muss, da Ihr keiner von uns seid. Bald wird es vorbei sein. Fr Euch und Eure gesamte Art.
You've proven your strength, alien. Enough with this fighting. Let us tend to our wounds.
Ihr habt Strke bewiesen, Alien. Genug gekmpft. Verbinden wir unsere Wunden.
Look, alien. An offer and a gift. You'd be a fool not to accept.
Schaut, Alien. Ein Angebot und ein Geschenk. Ihr wrt ein Narr, wrdet Ihr das ablehnen.
Wir nehmen Euer Angebot an, Alien.
The galaxy is awash in filthy aliens. It's sickening.
Die ganze Galaxie ist voller schmutziger Aliens. Es geht.
Do you ever tire of the sounds your hideous face makes? I do.
Habt Ihr jemals genug von den Geruschen, die Euer abscheuliches Gesicht von sich gibt? Ja.
Don't waste my time our yours with idle chatter. But mostly don't waste mine.
Verschwendet meine und Eure Zeit nicht mit sinnlosem Geschwtz. Aber verschwendet vor allem nicht meine.
Nice to talk to you too, Korath.
Freut mich auch, mit Euch geredet zu haben, Korath.
You seem uglier than normal today.
Ihr seht heute hsslicher aus als sonst.

We are scheduled for an election in 5 months. Pollsters report that we are likely to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]lose by a landslide[/COLOR].[BR][BR]Elections require that we watch our approval rating closely. Voters will not be easily swayed by short term measures and will consider their morale over a long period. All the things that increase approval will help us win elections like lowering the tax rate and building approval improvements. Or we can consider forms of government that don't hold elections. If we lose an election we will fall to a [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Coalition Government[/COLOR] which limits our power. Including blocking our ability to declare war.

Uns steht in 5 Monaten eine Wahl bevor. Umfragen zufolge ist es wahrscheinlich, dass wir eine herbe [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Niederlage erleiden werden.[/COLOR][BR][BR]Wahlen erfordern, dass wir unsere Zustimmungsrate genau im Auge behalten. Die Whler lassen sich nicht leicht durch kurzfristige Manahmen beeinflussen und werden ihre Stimmung ber einen lngeren Zeitraum bercksichtigen. Alles, was die Zustimmung erhht, wird uns helfen, Wahlen zu gewinnen, wie zum Beispiel die Senkung des Steuersatzes und den Ausbau der Zustimmungsverbesserungen. Oder wir knnten Regierungsformen in Betracht ziehen, die keine Wahlen abhalten. Wenn wir eine Wahl verlieren, werden wir zu einer [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Koalitionsregierung[/COLOR] wechseln, die unsere Macht einschrnkt. Einschlielich der Blockierung unserer Fhigkeit, Krieg zu erklren.

Our government is insufficient for the needs of our growing civilization. New colonies complain that the government only serves the homeworld and decisions across our worlds are becoming increasingly delayed by deeper and deeper levels of bureaucracy.[BR][BR]Governments are only effective at managing a certain number of worlds. After this [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Colony Limit[/COLOR] is exceeded we will suffer a Morale penalty for each Colony we control beyond this limit.

It transcends mere understanding, fostering a synergy that allows us to weave the intricate tapestries of alien societies into our own, enriching our collective knowledge and driving harmonious coexistence in the vast cosmic theater.

Utilizing advanced algorithms and nanobot swarms, this technology enables the systematic reconfiguration of planetary environments. By analyzing geological and atmospheric data, we can optimize planets for resource extraction and operational efficiency. Emotional and aesthetic factors are irrelevant; the objective is to create environments that are functionally optimal for our synthetic existence.

By analyzing geological and atmospheric data, we can optimize planets for resource extraction and operational efficiency. Employing a fusion of advanced algorithms and robust materials, this technology is the zenith of adaptive existence. It enables our synthetic forms to establish nodes and operational hubs on planets with the harshest and most volatile of environments. Where organic life recoils, we thrive, seeing opportunity in extremes. For a galaxy of boundless variability, this ensures our presence is universal and undeterred by the caprices of nature.

Every inhospitable corner of the galaxy is now a potential gold mine, awaiting our ambitious reach and relentless drive for accumulation.

The universe's bounties are ripe for the taking, and with this tech, every biological asset is another coin in our ever-growing treasury.

The death cries of your people are music to my ears.
Die Todeschreie deines Volkes sind Musik in meinen Ohren.
Eh, it's not like you'd understand me anyway.
Eh, es ist ja nicht so, als wrdest du mich sowieso verstehen.
You may not understand me, but I am doing the galaxy a favor ridding it of your civilization.
Sie verstehen mich vielleicht nicht, aber ich tue der Galaxie einen Gefallen, indem ich sie von Ihrer Zivilisation befreie.
The galaxy will be better off without your civilization.
Die Galaxie wird ohne Ihre Zivilisation besser dran sein.

This is the Utha [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS].[BR][BR]Here, the Empire will begin to rise again. The orders are clear: do what is needed to establish a solid foundation. The effort will require completing basic tasks to explore and [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonize[/HS] unclaimed planets. It will also involve preparing to grow the Empire's military.[BR][BR]To form a military worthy of the Empire, [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] must be constructed. [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] eventually come in four forms: [ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Military[/HS], [ICON=Icon_MiningStarbase] [HS=HS_MininingStarbase]Mining[/HS], [ICON=Icon_EconomicsStarbase] [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economic[/HS], and [ICON=Icon_MiningStarbase] [HS=HS_CommunicationsStarbase]Communication[/HS]. Each has a different use, so make sure to deploy them wisely. To deploy a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS], first build a [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructor[/HS] from a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS]. [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] can be converted into [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] with the [HS=HS_ConstructStarbase]Construct Starbase[/HS] command.[BR][BR]New Objective: Construct 3 Probes[BR]New Objective: Claim 5 Planets[BR]New Objective: Construct 3 Starbases

At last! With the research into Warships complete fighters can once more be constructed at the [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS].[BR][BR]It is time to build a formidable force. Not only for future conquest but in case the Terrans or any of the allies decide to investigate the [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS]. [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] management is vital to the Empire's future.[BR][BR]A [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] can be formed by [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Moving[/HS] ships onto the same tile. Keep an eye on the [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS]. If there isn't enough [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS], a ship cannot join a [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS] Ships and [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] onto Planets to serve as defenders of the planet and make it harder to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS]. Keep all this in mind as the military force grows.

Disgrace![BR][BR]We'll enthrall those who think themselves powerful enough to destroy our ships and survive. The Empire can ensure victory in future battles in a few ways. The first is to ensure our equipment is constantly improving by researching defenses, weapons, and more under the Warfare branch of the Tech Tree. Some [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] also allow the construction of larger ships.[BR][BR]Another technique is to ensure ships are grouped into [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS]. Form [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] by [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Moving[/HS] Ships onto the same tile. A [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] is restricted in size by its [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS], so if a [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] isn't forming or expanding, the [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS] score is likely too high.[BR][BR]Lastly, control when fights occur by staying on the offensive. Initiate battles heavily weighted in the Empire's favor to weaken our enemies while retaining our strength. Avoid fleets too powerful to quickly take down and utilize distance tactics such as the Beam Volley and Missile Volley.

Disgrace![BR][BR]We'll enthrall those who think themselves powerful enough to destroy our ships and survive. The Empire can ensure victory in future battles in a few ways. The first is to ensure our equipment is constantly improving by researching defenses, weapons, and more under the Warfare branch of the Tech Tree. Some [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] also allow the construction of larger ships.[BR][BR]Another technique is to ensure ships are grouped into [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS]. Form [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] by [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Moving[/HS] Ships onto the same tile. A [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] is restricted in size by its [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS], so if a [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] isn't forming or expanding, the [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS] score is likely too high.[BR][BR]Lastly, control when fights occur by staying on the offensive. Initiate battles heavily weighted in the Empire's favor to weaken our enemies while retaining our strength. Avoid fleets too powerful to quickly take down and utilize distance tactics such as the Beam Volley and Missile Volley.

Exploring and knowing the galaxy is the first step to expanding the Alliance's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS]. Probes are the best way to explore the universe. They have unrestricted [HS=HS_ShipRange]Range[/HS] and can move quickly.[BR][BR]The Alliance has provided a Probe already near Earth's orbit. Select that Probe using the LEFT Mouse Button and give it orders to [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS] to start exploring. This can be done by selecting where the Probe should move to on the map with the RIGHT Mouse Button or selecting the [ICON=AutoExplore_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoExplore]Auto-Explore[/HS] mode on the Probe's interface. A [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS] can only be finished once all ships and fleets have used all their moves or been put on Standby.[BR][BR]There's been reports of unusual signals. Their source and meaning are too faint to discern, but it's believed to be another Civilization. Use the Probe to find them.[BR][BR]New Objective: Locate the Other Civilization

Exploring and knowing the galaxy is the first step to expanding the Alliance's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS]. Probes are the best way to explore the universe. They have unrestricted [HS=HS_ShipRange]Range[/HS] and can move quickly.[BR][BR]The Alliance has provided a Probe already near Earth's orbit. Select that Probe using the LEFT Mouse Button and give it orders to [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS] to start exploring. This can be done by selecting where the Probe should move to on the map with the RIGHT Mouse Button or selecting the [ICON=AutoExplore_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoExplore]Auto-Explore[/HS] mode on the Probe's interface. A [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS] can only be finished once all ships and fleets have used all their moves or been put on Standby.[BR][BR]There's been reports of unusual signals. Their source and meaning are too faint to discern, but it's believed to be another Civilization. Use the Probe to find them.[BR][BR]New Objective: Locate the Other Civilization

A wary eye should be kept on the Drengin. Regardless, the Alliance must continue to secure the [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ships[/HS] are another critical piece to exploring the galaxy. [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ships[/HS] may be slower than Probes and are restricted in [HS=HS_ShipRange]Range[/HS], but they can defend themselves. More importantly, [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ships[/HS] can be used to investigate [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] take many forms, but they can all be scanned by a [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS]. A [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] takes a few [HS=HS_Months]Months[/HS] to complete, but it often reveals beneficial resources, components, or technology once finished.[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS] can be ordered to [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] by commanding it to the position of the [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] or by utilizing the [ICON=AutoSurvey_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoSurvey]Auto-Survey[/HS] feature of the ship.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Locate the Other Civilization[BR]New Objective: Scan an Anomaly

Success![BR][BR]The [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS] has finished [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Surveying[/HS] an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS]. Now, it's time to deal with whatever was uncovered.[BR][BR]Exploring the Galaxy is only the first step. Expanding the Alliance's influence will require colonizing new worlds. Not all planets are considered colonizable. Planets have a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS], rating how large, resource-rich, and habitable a planet is. Anything rated higher than 0 is colonizable. Planets with a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS] of 0 are considered a [HS=HS_DeadWorld]Dead World[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS] planets provide resources to the nearest [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. The Alliance's only [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] is the Home World, Earth.[BR][BR]Utilize the Colony Ship provided by the Alliance to [HS=HS_ColonizeOrder]Colonize[/HS] a planet. Mars has always been the closest viable neighbor. It's advisable to start there. Remember to keep searching the universe for [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] to scan; they'll continue to benefit and expand our understanding of the galaxy around us.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Scan an Anomaly[BR]New Objective: Colonize a Planet[BR]New Objective: Scan 5 Anomalies

You've settled your first planet large enough to establish a new [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]![BR][BR]Many planets aren't large enough to allow colonies to expand. [BR][BR]Due to their rarity, taking advantage of any planet resource-rich enough to justify larger colonies is advisable. Once a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] is appointed, a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] can be built over the planet, and the planet can be developed to better utilize the resources.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] can be recruited from the [ICON=Menu_Leader_Icon] [HS=HS_LeaderMenu]Leaders Menu[/HS] under the [HS=HS_RecruitmentScreen]Recruitment Screen[/HS]. No one can manage the entire Terran Alliance alone, no matter how competent. With the appropriate infrastructure, [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] can now be recruited. Every applicant has strengths and weaknesses, making them more or less suitable for any role.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] can serve as [HS=HS_Governor]Governors[/HS] and manage a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS], become [HS=HS_Diplomat]Diplomats[/HS] (if contact is made with other groups), and, importantly, they can serve as [HS=HS_Minister]Ministers[/HS]. [HS=HS_Minister]Ministers[/HS] focus on benefiting the entire civilization. Each ministry office has an area of focus and gives a benefit based on a Leader's specific skill.[BR][BR]Recruit new [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] from the [ICON=Menu_Leader_Icon] [HS=HS_LeaderMenu]Leaders Menu[/HS] under the [HS=HS_RecruitmentScreen]Recruitment Screen[/HS]. [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] can then be assigned to new roles under the [HS=HS_MinistersScreen]Ministers Screen[/HS].[BR][BR]New Objective: Appoint 3 Ministers

You've successfully appointed several [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] into roles as [HS=HS_Minister]Ministers[/HS]. Their support will go a long way to assisting in exploring the galaxy, settling new planets, and the expansion of the Terran Alliance's Influence. As you recruit new [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] or their skills change, you can always change what role a [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] has from the [ICON=Menu_Leader_Icon] [HS=HS_LeaderMenu]Leaders Menu[/HS].[BR][BR]There are other ways to benefit the entire Alliance. [HS=HS_Policy]Policies[/HS] are rules that can be issued to affect all colonies and fleets. To enact a [HS=HS_Policy]Policy[/HS], the appropriate [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] has to be researched in the [HS=HS_ResearchCenter]Research Center[/HS]. Research Colonial Policies to access the [ICON=Menu_CivilizationMenu_Icon] [HS=HS_CivilizationMenu]Civilization Menu[/HS] and a [HS=HS_Policy]Policies[/HS] slot.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Appoint 3 Ministers[BR]New Objective: Research Colonial Policies

Sometimes, especially during conflict, waiting a few [HS=HS_Months]Months[/HS] for something to finish isn't an option. In those scenarios, many projects and constructions can be [HS=HS_Rush]Rushed[/HS]. [HS=HS_Rush]Rushing[/HS] costs [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS], often a good deal of them, but it will reduce the time required to complete something to 1 [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS].[BR][BR]Some colonies are worried that conflict will take too much attention and resources. Alleviate their concerns by [HS=HS_Rush]Rushing[/HS] a planetary improvement to show them they're still remembered, and the Alliance continues to be invested in developing its worlds.[BR][BR]To [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] a Planetary Improvement, select a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] and open the Management window. Selecting any item in the Build Queue with the LEFT Mouse Button will bring up some contextual options. Among those is the [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] option. As long as you have the [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] required, selecting the [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] option will [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] the specific improvement. The [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] option will be grayed out and unresponsive if you do not have the necessary resources.[BR][BR]New Objective: Rush a Planetary Improvement

The citizens of the Alliance will appreciate the resources invested in their work. Great job.[BR][BR]It will be essential to know that [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] can only be used once per Colony and once per [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] in a [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS]. That is on top of the often hefty price required. [HS=HS_Rush]Rushing[/HS] is best used to gain a drastic advantage or swiftly respond to an issue.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Rush a Planetary Improvement

Over time, the Alliance gains [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS], a resource representing the ability to charm or force people to carry out specific orders. [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] can be spent in several ways, and one way that often costs the most is [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS].[BR][BR][ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] are abilities that happen immediately and can have various impacts. They can be beneficial in all types of scenarios. The Draft Colonists order may be the most helpful as the Alliance expands. Use an [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] to help with the Alliance's current goals.[BR][BR][ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] are selected from the related radial option. Some will execute as soon as the usage is confirmed. Others require a target and must be directed after confirming the order. Hover the Mouse over the [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] option and then use the LEFT Mouse Button to select an order.[BR][BR]New Objective: Use an Executive Order

Success![BR][BR]Your [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] has been carried out. Vuresef, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Tipot {PLAYERFACTION:1}'s orisih beha rinin holares. Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! (You need to research Universal Translator)
Vuresef, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Tipot {PLAYERFACTION:1} orisih beha rinin holares. Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! (Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A smooth-skinned biped stares back at us from the view screen. Wearing some kind of lightly ceremonial garb, it jabbers a short series of unintelligible grunting sounds. Getting no response from us, it gestures at someone off screen in a manner which suggests annoyance. They can't seem to understand us either.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein Zweifler mit glatter Haut starrt uns durch den Bildschirm an. Er trgt eine Art zeremonielle Robe und gibt eine Reihe von kurzen, unverstndlichen Grunzlauten von sich. Als er keine Antwort von uns bekommt, kommuniziert er aggressiv gestikulierend mit jemandem auerhalb des Bildschirms. Dieser Jemand kann uns offensichtlich auch nicht verstehen.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

Our screen flickers for a minute before the video emerges, filled with an image of a massive insectoid creature. [BR][BR]Motionless at first, its only a slight waver of its vicious pincers which indicate the creature is alive as it glares back at us. In the background, more of its kind move around, clicking and chittering at each other. A language of some kind, but it's impossible to determine what they're saying.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Unser Bildschirm flackert eine Weile, bevor das Bild wieder stabil wird. Es erscheint eine riesige insektoide Kreatur.[BR][BR]Zunchst steht sie vllig unbewegt da und starrt uns an, bis pltzlich eine kurze Bewegung ihrer brutalen Scheren darauf schlieen lsst, dass sie lebendig ist. Im Hintergrund bewegen sich weitere Kreaturen ihrer Art, die schnappend und schnatternd miteinander kommunizieren. Es drfte eine Sprache sein, aber es ist unmglich, festzustellen, was sie sagen.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A curious creature stares back at us from the screen. Ten or twelve legged, in the manner of a segmented insect, the creature also appears to have a lightly armored exoskeleton.[BR][BR]From its long, dexterous tongue, a series of subtle hissing noises emerges. It seems to be trying to communicate with us, but it's of no use.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Eine neugierige Kreatur starrt uns vom Bildschirm aus an. Zehn oder zwlf Beine, gegliedert wie bei einem Insekt, diese Kreatur scheint auerdem ber ein schtzendes Exoskelett zu verfgen.[BR][BR]Ihre lange, flinke Zunge gibt eine Reihe zischender Gerusche von sich. Sie will anscheinend mit uns kommunizieren, doch das bringt nichts.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A small, furry creature appears on screen. With its soft fur and enormous eyes, the being looks cute, and possibly delicious. Its eyes widen even further, perhaps realizing what we're thinking.[BR][BR]Eventually it opens its small, delicate mouth and emits a series of mewling noises. A speech of sorts, though who knows what it means. Something adorable, no doubt.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Eine kleine, pelzige Kreatur erscheint auf dem Bildschirm. Mit ihre weichen Fell und ihren groen Augen sieht die Kreatur niedlich aus. Mglicherweise schmeckt sie auch gut.[BR][BR]Ihre Augen weiten sich noch strker. Vielleicht wei sie, was wir denken. Langsam ffnet sie ihren kleinen, zarten Mund und gibt eine Reihe wimmernder Laute von sich. Sie scheint zu sprechen, doch wer wei schon, was sie sagen will. Sicher etwas Niedliches.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A green skinned biped appears on screen, wearing elaborate clothes and a headdress. Likely a female, if this species has the same notion of genders as we do, which may be a dangerous guess.[BR][BR] The creature utters something in their native tongue, unintelligible, yet somehow very, very compelling.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein grnhutiger Zweifler erscheint auf dem Bildschirm, der feinste Kleidung und Kopfschmuck trgt. Es drfte sich um ein Weibchen handeln, falls diese Spezies dasselbe Verstndnis von Geschlechtern hat wie wir. Das knnte allerdings eine gefhrliche Vermutung sein.[BR][BR]Die Kreatur gibt etwas in ihrer Muttersprache von sich, unverstndlich, aber irgendwie sehr, sehr fesselnd.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A ferocious looking humanoid fills the screen, glaring at you from behind green eyes. You can feel the contempt dripping from him, though he says nothing.[BR][BR]It murmurs something, almost below the range of hearing, and flicker of strange text crosses the screen, as the alien's communications systems try and fail to interface with ours. There will be no talking with this creature today.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein wild aussehender Humanoid fllt den Bildschirm aus und starrt Euch mit grnen Augen an. Verachtung schlgt Euch entgegen, obwohl er nichts sagt.[BR][BR]Es murmelt etwas, fast unterhalb der Hrweite, und seltsamer Text flackert auf dem Bildschirm, whrend die Kommunikationssysteme des Auerirdischen versuchen, sich mit unseren zu verbinden, jedoch scheitern. Heute werden wir es nicht mehr schaffen, mit diesen Kreaturen zu sprechen.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A cruel looking green skinned biped appears, glaring at us. Wearing armor of some kind, and baring its teeth, it gives every impression that it is a warrior, or at least wishes to be perceived as one.[BR][BR]It barks something angrily at the screen, and you wonder for a moment if it's truly a bad thing we can't understand what its saying.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein grausam aussehender grnhutiger Zweifler erscheint und starrt uns an. Mit seiner Rstung und seinen gefletschten Zhnen sieht er wie ein Krieger aus oder zumindest wie jemand, der wie ein Krieger aussehen will.[BR][BR]Wtend bellt er den Bildschirm an und Ihr fragt Euch kurz, ob es wirklich so schlimm ist, dass wir nicht verstehen, was er sagt.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A slender, blue skinned biped appears, delicate in feature and manner. It speaks calmly at us in a strange yet somehow noble speech.[BR][BR]Seeing no recognition in our response, it nods its head slowly, having realized the communication barrier that exists. If anything, it seems disappointed in us.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein schlanker, blauhutiger Zweifler mit grazilem Aussehen und Benehmen erscheint. Er spricht ruhig in einer merkwrdigen aber irgendwie edlen Sprache mit uns.[BR][BR]Als er bemerkt, dass wir ihn nicht verstehen, nickt er langsam und erkennt, dass es ein Kommunikationsproblem gibt. Er scheint von uns enttuscht zu sein.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A metallic creature appears on screen, unblinking red sensors staring back at us. The sensors iris open a bit, before narrowing, the creature studying us.[BR][BR]Sound emerges from it, a clash of discordant sounds, almost as if its trying different languages on us to see if we understand anything. We don't. The sensors narrow even further. There's no point communicating with this being now.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Eine metallische Kreatur erscheint auf dem Bildschirm, regungslose rote Sensoren starren uns an. Die Iriden der Sensoren ffnen sich ein wenig, bevor sie sich wieder verengen, die Kreatur mustert uns.[BR][BR]Sie gibt Gerusche von sich, eine Kakophonie disharmonischer Tne. Es klingt beinahe, als wrde sie verschiedene Sprachen ausprobieren, um zu sehen, ob wir welche davon verstehen. Wir verstehen es nicht. Die Sensoren fokussieren sich auf dem Signal. Es wre sinnlos, jetzt mit diesem Wesen zu kommunizieren.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A small biped appears on screen, staring at us. It has a wide, flat skull, and large eyes which seem to avoid making eye contact with us. Perhaps a side effect of the communication system.[BR][BR]It murmurs at us for a time in a language devoid of sharp consonant sounds, but no meaning really comes through. We'll have to converse with this strange creature another time.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein kleiner Zweifler erscheint auf dem Bildschirm und starrt uns an. Er hat einen breiten, flachen Schdel und groe Augen, die anscheinend den Blickkontakt mit uns vermeiden. Vielleicht ist das ein Nebeneffekt des Kommunikationssystems.[BR][BR]Eine Weile murmelt er etwas in einer Sprache ohne scharfe Konsonanten, doch nichts davon ist verstndlich. Wir mssen uns zu einem anderen Zeitpunkt mit dieser merkwrdigen Kreatur unterhalten.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A being in much the same shape as a crustacean wobbles cheerfully on our view screen, a jumble of eyes and legs. A gentle shimmer suggests the creature - and its kin working behind him - are underwater at the moment.[BR][BR]The creature clicks and snaps its claws in our direction, no doubt trying to say something. Hard to say what it could be at this point.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein Wesen, das an ein Krebstier erinnert, stakst frhlich ber den Bildschirm, ein Gewirr aus Augen und Beinen. Ein fahler Schimmer lsst darauf schlieen, dass sich die Kreatur und ihre Artgenossen, die hinter ihr arbeiten, gerade unter Wasser befinden.[BR][BR]Die Kreatur klappert und klickt mit ihren Klauen in unsere Richtung, zweifellos will sie uns etwas mitteilen. Schwer zu sagen, was es sein knnte.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A tall bipedal alien appears on screen with a distinct, ridged skull. The being has six eyes, spread widely across its face, which all pivot to look at us.[BR][BR]Has it seen our kind before, or are we as much of a mystery to them as they are to us? It says something, quick and repetitive, almost a chant. A ritual greeting perhaps? But there's no making sense of it.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein groer zweifiger Alien mit einem eigenartig gefurchten Schdel erscheint auf dem Bildschirm. Das Wesen hat sechs weit ber sein Gesicht verteilte Augen, die sich alle zugleich drehen, um uns anzuschauen.[BR][BR]Hat es unsere Spezies schon mal gesehen oder findet es uns genauso mysteris wie sie? Es spricht, schnell und monoton, fast als wrde es singen. Vielleicht eine rituelle Begrung? Doch es ist unverstndlich.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

An alien appears on the view screen, likely bipedal, with a long, narrow skull and slender tendrils appearing from the mouth area.[BR][BR]Small eyes towards the top of the skull narrow as it says something. The tone of the language suggests a question, though we can't understand it. The alien sways gently, sensing the futility of further communication.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein Alien erscheint auf dem Bildschirm, wohl ein Zweifler, mit einem langen, schmalen Schdel und dnnen Ranken im Mundbereich.[BR][BR]Kleine Augen oben im Schdel verengen sich, whrend er etwas sagt. Der Tonfall lsst vermuten, dass es sich um eine Frage handelt, jedoch knnen wir sie nicht verstehen. Der Alien wiegt sich gemchlich. Er sprt, dass weitere Kommunikationsversuche sinnlos wren.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A strange bipedal alien appears on screen, with lizard-like, even draconid qualities. The crested ridges above its eyes flex, as it leans in to study us from its perch in an ornate looking room.[BR][BR]A deep growling voice emerges from somewhere deep within it, the mouth barely moving. A pleasant greeting or dire threat, we can't be sure.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein merkwrdiger zweifiger Alien, der an eine Echse oder sogar einen Drachen erinnert, erscheint auf dem Bildschirm. Die gezahnten Wlste ber seinen Augen ziehen sich zusammen, whrend es sich auf seinem Thron in einem kunstvoll verzierten Raum vorlehnt, um uns zu mustern.[BR][BR]Eine tiefe, knurrende Stimme ertnt aus seinem Inneren, whrend sich der Mund kaum bewegt. Eine freundliche Begrung oder eine Todesdrohung, man wei es nicht.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A gray skinned hominoid alien peers back at us from the view screen. The alien has four eyes, and a thin smile which gives the impression of friendliness, though that may be a dangerous assumption.[BR][BR]Behind the creature, a clean, even sterile looking spaceship can be seen. Some words are exchanged, but nothing can be understood between you and them. The thin smile remains though. All in good time, it would seem.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein grauhutiger humanoider Alien starrt uns vom Bildschirm aus an. Der Alien hat vier Augen und ein dnnes Lcheln, dass ihn freundlich wirken lsst, obwohl das eine gefhrliche Mutmaung sein knnte.[BR][BR]Hinter der Kreatur ist ein sauber, ja steril aussehendes Raumschiff zu sehen. Worte werden ausgetauscht, aber Ihr versteht einander nicht. Das dnne Lcheln bleibt jedoch.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A tall hominoid alien appraises us from the view screen. Although bipedal, the segmented section of its neck suggests perhaps an annelid biology.[BR][BR]Whatever its origin, the being tries a few words in its native tongue, a strange combination of rumbles and rhythmic vibrations, though nothing can be understood from it. The alien seems bemused by our speech as well.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Ein groer humanoider Alien taxiert uns auf dem Bildschirm. Obwohl es sich um einen Zweifler handelt, lsst der segmentierte Abschnitt seines Halses darauf schlieen, dass er den Anneliden angehrt.[BR][BR]Wie auch immer, das Wesen gibt ein paar Worte in seiner Muttersprache von sich, eine merkwrdige Kombination aus Knurren und rhythmischen Vibrationen, vllig unverstndlich. Der Alien scheint unsere Sprache auch nicht zu verstehen.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A strange plantlike creature appears on screen. Bark like skin covers its trunk and surprisingly humanoid looking face, before giving way to sleek, well maintained foliage further up.[BR][BR]In the background, a decidedly organic, plant-like ship can be seen. The creature emits a series of long, creaking groans, evidently trying to communicate with us. No sense can be made of it, for now.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Eine merkwrdige pflanzenartige Kreatur erscheint auf dem Bildschirm. Rindenhnliche Haut bedeckt ihren Rumpf und ihr berraschend menschlich wirkendes Gesicht.[BR][BR]Aus ihrem Kopf spriet gut gepflegtes Blattwerk. Im Hintergrund ist ein organisches, pflanzenhnliches Schiff zu sehen. Die Kreatur gibt eine Reihe langer, quietschender Laute von sich und versucht offensichtlich, mit uns zu kommunizieren. Momentan knnen wir sie nicht verstehen.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

A glimmering creature appears on the screen, its body formed of blue crystal with wide intelligent eyes. As beautiful as it is, your awe at seeing it is not reflected in its face, which instead looks sympathetic or disgusted.[BR][BR]There is a brief pause as the creature considers you and you almost hear voices, like memories echoing distantly in your mind. But you cannot tell what they say, or if they are coming from the alien. Disappointed the creature hums softly in almost musical tones. It is beautiful, but equally indecipherable. [BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Auf dem Bildschirm erscheint eine schimmernde Kreatur, dessen Krper aus blauem Kristall mit groen, intelligenten Augen besteht. So schn es auch ist, ihre Ehrfurcht, es zu sehen, spiegelt sich diese nicht in seinem Gesicht wider.[BR][BR]Stattdessen sieht es mitfhlend oder angewidert aus. Es gibt eine kurze Pause, whrend die Kreatur dich betrachtet, und du hrst fast Stimmen, wie Erinnerungen, die entfernt in deinem Kopf widerhallen. Aber Sie knnen nicht feststellen, was die Auerirdischen sagen oder ob sie berhaupt von denen kommen. Enttuscht summt das Wesen leise in fast musikalischen Tnen. Es ist beeindruckend, aber ebenso unentzifferbar.[BR][BR](Ihr msst den Universalbersetzer erforschen)

The incoming message comes with the visage of a slender alien covered naturally in fuzz and chitin. Large compound eyes blink quickly and frequently.[BR][BR]A series of melodic hissing clicks comes from the being. After a short pause, another series of sounds come through the speakers, coupled with soft hand motions. Without a means to decipher the message, proper communication is unachievable.[BR][BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

Die eingehende Nachricht zeigt das Bild eines schlanken Auerirdischen, der natrlich mit Flaum und Chitin bedeckt ist. Groe Facettenaugen blinzeln schnell und hufig.[BR][BR]Von dem Wesen kommt eine Reihe von melodischen Zisch- und Klickgeruschen. Nach einer kurzen Pause kommen weitere Gerusche aus den Lautsprechern, begleitet von sanften Handbewegungen. Ohne eine Mglichkeit, die Nachricht zu entschlsseln, ist eine angemessene Kommunikation nicht mglich.[BR][BR](Sie mssen den Universalbersetzer erforschen.)
"We have no pressing ship construction needs right now."

"Our colonies could use more protection from stationed ships."

"Much of the galaxy remains a mystery to us. We should build some probes to learn about our surroundings."

"There are anomalies we could be surveying, if we had more survey ships at our disposal."

Newly discovered records reveal the Navigators' desperate attempt to halt the Drengin's rapid growth by concealing subspace stream entrances, shedding light on the past struggle for galactic stability and the race to develop countermeasures against this formidable threat.

Neu entdeckte Aufzeichnungen enthllen den verzweifelten Versuch der Navigatoren, das rasante Wachstum der Drengin zu stoppen, indem sie Eingnge zu Subraumstrmen versteckten. Dies wirft ein neues Licht auf den frheren Kampf um galaktische Stabilitt und das Wettrennen um die Entwicklung von Gegenmanahmen gegen diese gewaltige Bedrohung.

The once-prominent Thalan Empire has mysteriously vanished from the galactic scene after nearly a century of influence, leaving the interstellar community puzzled and searching for answers to their sudden disappearance.

Das einst prominente Thalan-Imperium ist nach fast einem Jahrhundert des Einflusses auf rtselhafte Weise von der galaktischen Bhne verschwunden und lsst die interstellare Gemeinschaft verwirrt zurck, auf der Suche nach Antworten zu ihrem pltzlichen Verschwinden.
